text: Last Embrace is a 1979 American thriller movie directed by Jonathan Demme and based on the novel The 13th Man by Murray Teigh Bloom. It stars Roy Scheider, Janet Margolin, Christopher Walken, Sam Levene, Marcia Rodd, Charles Napier and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1979 thriller movies Category:1979 mystery movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Jonathan Demme
title: Last Embrace
